body_html:
Hi @ebrevdo ,

I have tried dynamic_rnn. But it is still ultra slow when building the graph

My model is 200~300 steps encoder and 30 steps decoder with attention,

The mini model of 100 steps encoder and 30 steps decoder takes 400s to build.

I cannot even build the full model on my machine (16 G Memory) due to out of memory, while the same model without attention using mxnet takes approx 20% of the memory.

Could you please provide any solution to that?

Thanks all

body:
Hi @ebrevdo ,

I have tried `dynamic_rnn`. But it is still ultra slow when building the graph

My model is 200~300 steps encoder and 30 steps decoder with attention,

The mini model of 100 steps encoder and 30 steps decoder takes 400s to build.

I cannot even build the full model on my machine (16 G Memory) due to out of memory, while the same model without attention using mxnet takes approx 20% of the memory.

Could you please provide any solution to that?

Thanks all
